title: [vs17.8] Backport pipeline updates
body:
### Context
Backporting pipeline updates to this branch to enable automated scheduled runs. Mergeflow will propagate it to 17.10,11,12 where it also should go to schedule insertions by default. Insertion from all branches can be triggered manually from main if needed.

### Changes Made
https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/pull/10920
https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/pull/10966

No change to product, only pipelines.

### Testing
Manual testing of the pipeline in AzDO

commit.message: copy new insertion pipeline to vs17.8

nodes.body:
Hello! I noticed that you're targeting one of our servicing branches. Please consider updating the version.
<!-- Policy app identification https://img.shields.io/static/v1?label=PullRequestIssueManagement. -->
This would not work, the triggers have to be done differently.
